pynamics.kinematics.topology.Frame¶

class pynamics.kinematics.topology.Frame(translation: matrix = matrix([[0.], [0.], [0.]]), rotation: matrix = array([[1., 0., 0.], [0., 1., 0.], [0., 0., 1.]]))¶

A frame on a Body

__init__(translation: matrix = matrix([[0.], [0.], [0.]]), rotation: matrix = array([[1., 0., 0.], [0., 1., 0.], [0., 0., 1.]]))¶

Create a frame.

Args:

translation (np.matrix, optional): Translation from the body frame. Defaults to np.matrix([0.0,0.0,0.0]).T. rotation (np.matrix, optional): Rotation expressing vectors in the created frame, in the body frame. Defaults to np.eye(3,3).

Methods

__init__([translation, rotation])

Create a frame.

get_rotation_matrix(angle, axis)

Get the rotation matrix for the (angle, axis) representation of a rotation.
